metadata.title: W3Schools.com

metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Statistics is the science of analyzing, reviewing and conclude data.
content.html: Statistics is the science of analyzing, reviewing and conclude data.

content.text: The R language was developed by two statisticians. It has many built-in functionalities, in addition to libraries for the exact purpose of statistical analysis.
content.html: The R language was developed by two statisticians. It has many built-in functionalities, in addition to libraries for the exact purpose of statistical analysis.

content.text: You will learn about these features, and how to use them in the next chapters.
content.html: You will learn about these features, and how to use them in the next chapters.

content.text: Tip: If you are completely new to statistics, and want to learn more about it, visit our Statistics Tutorial .
content.html: Tip: If you are completely new to statistics, and want to learn more about it, visit our Statistics Tutorial.
